They did indeed consider my request. Iâm grateful that they took the time to reconsider my issue. I thank them for their efforts and will continue to use the app.

Plain and simple, customer service is awful. I bought tickets for a blockbuster premier. Apparently someone else reserved the same seats at the same time. Atom still charged me and didnât notify me for over an hour that my seats reservation failed. They refunded my tickets but by that time the theater was sold out. I was able to book a different showing the same night directly through the theater and not through Atom. But it was inconvenient and messed up plans for others for the night. I had just signed up for the MegaPass program which has a6 month commitment. It is basically $15/month and gives you two free passes. Not bad if you like to go to the movies. I requested they cancel my membership since I no longer have confidence in their system. They simply quoted company policy and stated that sometimes it happens on busy nights. I asked if they could do anything at all to show they cared about their customer experience and the answer was no. This is my experience, it looks like Iâm not alone.

Atom makes it so easy to find a theater, but tickets, and even pay for food and drinks and snacks in advance. This app is very user-friendly, that is understandable to all ages. If you want to look at whatâs out there, theyâll have it, and you can even buy tickets on the app itself. By ordering seats in advance, you can ensure you will get a good seat in the theaters. Although they have a pricey convenience fee, you can often minimize that by using the T-mobile Tuesdayâs app (if youâre a T-mobile user) and there are deals on $5 off and they wipe out the $1.50 convenience fee that is set on each ticket. Iâm so in love with this app already, I got tickets from AMC for $7.74 a ticket without any hassle! Before they would sell âgoldâ tickets that are $8 each but to be honest, these are just a bit better. You also get to look at upcoming movies and pay for concession meals in advance and thatâs a huge advantage of using this app. Itâs living up to its hype!

Now mind you the span of me trying to purchase tix was done in a month. Continuously got error message to update my payment method when I have proof that I had money in my atom account. What was the resolution for the customer care Dept? Deactivate my account, supposedly wait 7-10 days to get part of money back. Itâs better not to do third party sellers. 1.
